name: Never a Dull Moment
description:
Lets just say...you're not a boring person to be around. Hehe.

This game was a submission for the Friday Night Game Jam, which was done in pretty much all my 3 hours. The theme was "Home".

I know theres a bit of bugs in the game, but uhhh... I didn't have enough time to fix it. BUT, the game should be fully functional nonetheless.

All of the art and programming was done by me.

Music used:

Music: “Daydreaming”, from PlayOnLoop.com
